caption.p: Significant anxiolytic-like effects of compound 1 and the reference drug (CZP, 0.5 mg/kg, p.o.) in comparison to the vehicle group (s.s.) were obtained in the plus-maze test (A, * p < 0.0001), open-field test (B, * p < 0.0001) and hole-board test (C, * p < 0.006) after ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc test. ns: non-significant differences.
